MON TUES WED THURS FRI 10.21.09
Hungry Girl,
If you were going with friends to one of the top five fast food places in America, what would you order? And at which one could you get the most volume and flavor for your calorie buck?
Fast Food Fever Dear Fast Food Fever,
Excellent question! I love that I can go into practically ANY fast food restaurant and find something HG-friendly to eat. (Which means you can, too!) Truly... Any and every fast food chain restaurant has SOMETHING. Typically, I stick with chicken. I order whatever grilled chicken sandwich the place offers (sometimes two!), but with no sauce, condiments, or bun... just the chicken over some lettuce and tomato. Other times I'll order a grilled chicken salad (no cheese or croutons) plus an extra chicken breast on the side (or a garden salad with two chicken breasts on the side). If I want dressing, I stick with a low-fat or fat-free kind, read the packet nutritionals carefully, and usually only use about half the packet. As for the fast food place that offers the most flavor and volume for my calorie buck? That would have to be Burger King. BK has the best-tasting, juiciest chicken of them all! BTW, check out our full-on fast food survival guides from last year by clicking on these links: Burger King , McDonald's , Taco Bell , and Wendy's . Happy chewing!!!
HG,
I'm looking for recipes that include pumpkin. Got any?
Pumpkin Queen
Dear PQ,
Hmmmm... If you TRULY are the Pumpkin Queen, then you will FREAK over so many of our pumpkin-packed HG recipes. I'm just going to list some of my personal favorites for you here and now. Get ready for your head to explode! :)
Caramel Pumpkin Pudding Cupcakes - This recipe's an exclusive from Hungry Girl: Recipes&Survival Strategies for Guilt-Free Eating in the Real World .
Pumpkin-licious Nog - Amazing. And I don't even like traditional eggnog.
Totally PUMPin' Fettuccine - AWESOME!
Yum Yum Brownie Muffins - These don't taste like pumpkin at all, but I couldn't leave them out. This is the easiest HG recipe of all time!
Surprise, It's Pumpkin! Enchiladas - Don't knock 'em 'til you try 'em ...
Perfect Pumpkin Bread - So good, you will want to marry it ...
Too-Good-To-Deny Pumpkin Pie - A pumpkin pie lover's dream come true .
Complete&Utter Oatmeal INSANITY! - This is one of my favorite ways to start the day. There you have it. My favorite pumpkin-packed HG recipes. Now go make some, Pumpkin Queen!
